name: H.E.I.S.T - Syndicate of Thieves
description:
Hello, thank you for your interest in the game ! Here are some things you should know before downloading ! 

1 - This student  project was made as a group of 6 people of the following  : game design, game dev, game art, animation

2 - It was made with Unity and took 2 month to develop (prototype state).

3 - The game features only one level but it's solvable ! 

We all hope you enjoy your experience ! 

Here are a few questions that could help you comment :

Was the propose of the game clear to you ? 

Did you try things that were not possible ?  If so, what led you to believe it was ?

What would you add to the game to make it better ? 

Did you like the game ? 

We look forward to read your comments  !
